snippet.title: SNES Longplay [070] Super Mario World 2: Yoshi's Island (part 2 of 2)
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.net

Played By: ScHlAuChi

This is a 100% run, showing all secrets and getting 100% on all levels.

Note:
At the final level i did some editing, i enter Bowsers castle, but it says Extra 6, thats because i edited that level in right before the castle so it wouldnt be tacked on after the ending.
Also, in Bowsers castle you have 4 doors, i added all 4 levels one after another, so it shows them in order 1-2-3-4 before i enter the the final corridor leading to Bowser!

Enjoy the 2nd best Plattformer of all time after Super Mario World :) -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
